mapper.select: SELECT M.NICKNAME, R.CONTENT, R.WRITE_TIME writeTime, R.WRITING_NUMBER writingNumber FROM REVIEW R, MEMBER M WHERE R.BRANCH_NUMBER=#{branchNumber} AND R.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER ORDER BY WRITING_NUMBER ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (MEMBER_NUMBER, BRANCH_NUMBER, CONTENT, WRITE_TIME) VALUES (#{MEMBER_NUMBER}, #{branchNumber}, #{CONTENT}, now())
